name: White Butterfly (Syngonium Podophyllum)
description: A beautiful and easy-to-care-for houseplant with arrow-shaped leaves that feature striking white and green variegation. Perfect for adding a touch of nature to any indoor space.

name: Peace Lily
description: An elegant flowering plant known for its air-purifying qualities and beautiful white blooms. Thrives in low light conditions, making it perfect for offices and homes.

name: Chlorophytum Spider Plant
description: A resilient and fast-growing plant with arching green and white striped leaves. Excellent for hanging baskets and known for its air-purifying properties.

name: Money Plant Marble Prince
description: A popular variety of money plant with stunning marbled green and white leaves. Believed to bring good luck and prosperity while being extremely easy to maintain.

name: Snake Plant (Sansevieria)
description: An extremely hardy plant with tall, upright leaves that feature yellow edges. Known for thriving in neglect and purifying indoor air by removing toxins.

name: Aglaonema Lipstick
description: A colorful tropical plant with glossy green leaves accented by pink edges. Adds vibrant color to any space while being relatively low-maintenance.

name: Jade Plant (Portulacaria afra)
description: A succulent plant with small, round green leaves and reddish stems. Often called 'Dwarf Jade' and known for being drought-tolerant and easy to propagate.

name: Rubber Tree (Ficus elastica)
description: A striking indoor tree with large, glossy leaves that range from deep green to burgundy. Grows tall over time and makes a dramatic statement in any room.

name: Krishna Tulsi Plant(Black)
description: A sacred variety of holy basil with dark purple leaves and strong medicinal properties. Used in Ayurveda for its health benefits and spiritual significance.

name: Lemon Grass
description: A fragrant culinary and medicinal herb with long, slender leaves. Used in teas, soups, and Asian cuisine while also repelling mosquitoes naturally.

name: Curry Leaves
description: An essential herb in Indian cooking with aromatic leaves that add distinct flavor to dishes. The plant is small and shrub-like, producing leaves year-round.

name: Rama Tulsi Plant
description: The green variety of holy basil, revered in Hindu culture and valued for its medicinal properties. Used in teas and herbal remedies for its health benefits.

name: Ajwain Leaves
description: A medicinal herb with small, fragrant leaves used in traditional medicine. Known for aiding digestion and having a thyme-like flavor when used in cooking.

name: Mentha Arvensis (Japanese Mint)
description: A vigorous mint variety with refreshing aroma and flavor. Used in teas, culinary dishes, and for its essential oil which has cooling properties.

name: Black Turmeric Plant (Black Haldi)
description: A rare variety of turmeric with dark blue-black rhizomes. Highly valued in traditional medicine for its potent therapeutic properties and spiritual uses.

name: Bhuiamla
description: A medicinal herb known as Stonebreaker, traditionally used for kidney and liver health. Features small green leaves and yellow flowers.

name: Wild Asparagus
description: A perennial plant with feathery foliage and edible shoots. Known for its nutritional value and use in gourmet cooking and herbal medicine.

name: Jasminum sambac
description: The famous Arabian jasmine with intensely fragrant white flowers. Used in perfumes, teas, and religious ceremonies across many cultures.

name: Parijat Tree
description: The mystical night-flowering jasmine with fragrant white and orange blossoms that fall at dawn. Featured in many Indian legends and traditional medicines.

name: Rose
description: The classic flowering plant available in countless varieties and colors. Prized for its beautiful blooms and fragrance that enhances any garden.

name: Raat Rani
description: The night-blooming jasmine that releases its intoxicating fragrance after sunset. A must-have for moon gardens and romantic outdoor spaces.

name: Shevanti
description: Chrysanthemum flowers that bloom in vibrant colors during autumn. Popular in gardens and floral arrangements for their long-lasting blooms.

name: Marigold (Orange)
description: Bright orange flowers that bloom profusely and are used in festivals and religious ceremonies. Easy to grow and helps repel garden pests naturally.

name: Champa (White)
description: Frangipani tree with highly fragrant white flowers and glossy leaves. A tropical beauty that adds elegance and perfume to any garden space.

name: Rajnigandha
description: Tuberose flowers known for their powerful sweet fragrance that intensifies at night. Popular in perfumery and traditional flower garlands.

name: Fragrant Panama rose
description: A vigorous climbing rose with clusters of small, intensely fragrant pink flowers. Blooms repeatedly and makes excellent cut flowers.

name: Pincushion Cactus
description: A small, globular cactus covered in colorful spines. Produces vibrant flowers and stays compact, perfect for windowsill gardens.

name: Bunny Ear Cactus
description: A cute, pad-forming cactus resembling bunny ears. Features yellow glochids instead of long spines, making it less dangerous than other cacti.

name: Echinopsis chamaecereus - Cactus
description: Also called Peanut Cactus for its finger-like stems. Produces spectacular large orange-red flowers that contrast beautifully with the green stems.

name: Golden Pipe Cactus
description: A columnar cactus that grows tall with golden spines. Makes a dramatic statement in xeriscapes and requires minimal care.

name: Moon Cactus (Grafted)
description: A colorful grafted cactus with a bright red, orange, or yellow top on green rootstock. Adds vibrant color to any cactus collection.

name: Graptoveria opalina - Succulent Plant
description: A beautiful rosette-forming succulent with opalescent pink-tinged leaves. Drought-tolerant and perfect for container gardens.

name: Crassula tetragona - Succulent Plant
description: A unique succulent with upright, narrow leaves forming miniature pine tree-like shapes. Easy to grow and quite drought resistant.

name: Aloevera
description: The famous medicinal succulent with thick, gel-filled leaves. Used for skin care, burns, and its air-purifying properties in homes.

name: Euphorbia (Red)
description: A striking succulent with red-tinged foliage and architectural form. Adds bold color and texture to succulent arrangements.

name: Vermicompost
description: Organic fertilizer produced by worms, rich in nutrients and beneficial microorganisms. Improves soil structure and plant health naturally.

name: Vermicompost Mixture
description: A special blend of vermicompost with other organic amendments for enhanced plant growth. Provides balanced nutrition for all types of plants.

name: Dec-Neemo (Bio-fertilizer)
description: Organic neem-based fertilizer that nourishes plants while protecting against pests. Improves soil health and plant immunity naturally.

name: Dec-Mori (Bio-fertilizer)
description: A moringa-based organic plant tonic that boosts growth and flowering. Rich in nutrients and growth hormones derived from moringa leaves.

name: Agni Shield
description: An organic plant protector that strengthens plants against environmental stress. Helps plants withstand heat, drought, and other challenging conditions.
